testcase.classname: guest user should be able to register on the system
testcase.name: guest user registers with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on Register tab............................................passed And user fills “Your Personal Details” fields...............................passed And user fills “Company Details” field......................................passed And user fills Fill “Your Password” fields..................................passed And user Clicks on REGISTER button..........................................passed Then user could register with valid data successfully.......................passed

testcase.classname: guest user should be able to login to the System
testcase.name: guest user could Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on Log in tab..............................................passed And user enters "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........................passed And user clicks on LOG IN button............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user should be able to switch between currencies [$, €] in home page
testcase.name: guest user could select Euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user selects “Euro” from currency dropdown list........................passed Then Euro currency is displayed.............................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user should be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for products using product name
testcase.system-out: When user enters product name "apple".......................................passed And user clicks on search field in home page................................passed Then relative Apple products are displayed..................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user should be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for products using product SKU
testcase.system-out: When user enters product SKU "AP_MBP_13"....................................passed And user clicks on search field.............................................passed Then relative product is displayed..........................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user should be able to hover categories and select sub category
testcase.name: user could hover categories and select sub category
testcase.system-out: When user covers category and select subcategory............................passed Then user clicks on subcategory.............................................passed
